title: The River kings
creator_credit: Donald Crombie, Rob George, ABC-TV (Australia) and Prospect Productions
brief_description: The River kings is a powerful and emotional story of a boy growing to manhood. Set on Australia’s grandest river, the River Murray, it provides a stunning backdrop to a gritty, human tale as young Shawn battles to survive and save his family from poverty. Peopled with rich warm characters and images, “The River kings” is a funny, sad and romantic family saga. Stars Tamblyn Lord, Bill Kerr, Kate Mulcahy, Willie Fennell.
